name: spleenwort
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant that is a type of fern, often growing on rocks or walls. There are many different species (= types) of spleenwort. It was sometimes used in the past to treat diseases of the spleen.
Arterra/Contributor/ Universal Images Group/GettyImages
